title: Net-Zero City Plan

concept_focus: Tree of Thoughts explores & evaluates multiple reasoning paths/strategies.

title: ToT: Trip Planning Options
description: Tree of Thoughts (ToT) explores multiple reasoning paths or options simultaneously, like branches on a tree. Your task is to outline different potential activity options (branches) for the first day of a weekend trip.
task: You are planning a weekend trip to London. Outline 2-3 potential options (thought branches) for activities for the first day (Saturday). Consider different interests like history, art, or entertainment.
prompt_template:
Outline 2-3 distinct options (thought branches) for the first day (Saturday) of a weekend trip to London, catering to different interests. Structure your output clearly showing the different options.

Trip Plan - Day 1 Options:
hints: Think about different themes for a day: history, art, food, entertainment, relaxation.
Structure the prompt to ask for distinct options or branches.
Label each option clearly (e.g., Option 1:, Option 2:).
ToT often involves evaluating these branches, but here we focus on generating them.
success_message: Great planning! You successfully outlined distinct branches of thought for the trip, demonstrating the ToT concept.
